request.description:
List API return the list of all posts based on the posts liked by the user.

Note: Please add the 'user token' as the 'Autherization Header'

response.name: Success response

request.description:
API for liking/unliking the posts. This API is only for users, 'admins are restricted from liking or unliking the posts'.

Note: Please add the 'user token' as the 'Autherization Header'

response.name: admin user like/unlike response(forbidden)

request.description:
This API returns all the users who have liked a particular post.

Note: Please add the 'user token' as the 'Autherization Header'

response.name: success response
